QuestData.Title: Arkhaan's Prayers
QuestData.Description: <As you near the statue, a somber voice fills your mind.>$b$b"You must resist the shadow's pull. Come to me, brothers and sisters. Be whole within the Light.$b$bLet Arkhaan show you the way home."$b$b<The rest of the message is garbled, though the nearby broken seem to be gnawing on pieces of the statue.>
QuestData.RewardText: What is this... a sermon? Fascinating.
